articles.description: Singapore's prosecutor on Friday filed 23 more charges in court against Lim Oon Kuin, the founder of collapsed oil trading firm Hin Leong Trading Pte Ltd. Singapore police last year charged the 79-year-old former oil tycoon, better known as O.K. Lim, with two…
